meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath the pubic bone.
meanings.sent1: The subpubic region is located below the pubic bone.
meanings.sent2: Her doctor mentioned the subpubic area during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The subpubic space was so tiny, it felt like a secret hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: The subpubic layer of the body is like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The subpubic position of the injury made it difficult to access for treatment.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the area below the pubic bone.
meanings.sent1: The subpubic muscles play a crucial role in certain movements.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her subpubic region after the workout.
meanings.sent3: The subpubic nerves seemed to have a mind of their own, causing unexpected sensations.
meanings.sent4: His subpubic strength was evident in the way he effortlessly lifted heavy objects.
meanings.sent5: The subpubic discomfort was a constant reminder of the injury sustained during the game.
